As Flint is about to insert the USB device, the sentient machine creates a baby marshmallow, which is lovingly welcomed by a family of marshmallows. Flint recognizes the mistake he almost made, as the machine, which attached itself to the island's ecosystem and altered it in the process, is acting as the life force to all the foodimals on the island and is not dangerous to them in any way. He refuses to use the USB device, but Chester attacks and is able to seize control of the FLDSMDFR. Chester knocks Flint into a river, where he is rescued by the marshmallows and reunites with Tim. Without the FLDSMDFR, he and his father find that the existing foodimals on the island are unable to produce new foodimals and flourish. As Flint offers his condolences to the endangered foodimals, he is surprised to discover that the foodimals, having watched old footage of Flint inventing the FLDSMDFR, have dubbed him "Inwoo""
column37: their creator, and revere him. Inspired, Flint vows to get his machine and friends back. Tim and the foodimals help Flint and Barry sneak into the Live Corp base. Flint challenges Chester to turn over the FLDSMDFR, but Chester threatens to use his friends in his food bar processing machine. Chester announces his plan to use the FLDSMDFR and the foodimals he's captured to make food bars as well. Barb, who has grown tired of Chester's insults, objects to the violence and is fired by Chester. Flint apologizes to the gang, and with the help of Sam and Steve is able to use his inventions to beat Chester and free the others, while Chester's captive foodimals are freed by Barry and proceed to drive away the Live Corp employees. Chester tries to escape with the FLDSMDFR, but he is cornered by the gang and the foodimals, and Barb steals the machine back from him, inadvertently sending him tumbling into the food processor. Chester manages to survive with the help of his own inventions, but is swallowed by the cheespider while he is gloating. Later, Flint returns the FLDSMDFR to the rock candy mountain where he found it and removes the USB device, successfully reactivating it. Doing this allows the machine to continue being sentient, and create foodimals at its own will. The foodimals continue to flourish naturally. Flint reconciles with Sam and Tim, who lets him try out fishing for the first time. It is shown during the credits that the residents of Swallow Falls have returned to their proper homes, adapting to the altered ecosystem and happily continuing their lives. The FLDSMDFR still continues foodimal production, and they continue to flourish alongside the humans. In a mid-credit scene, Barb develops a crush on Steve, attempting to ask him out on a date.
